emma2.msm.analysis¶

analysis - MSM analysis functions (emma2.msm.analysis)¶

Assessment of MSM properties¶

is_transition_matrix(T[, tol]) True if T is a transition matrix

Functions

committor(P, A, B[, forward]) Compute the committor between sets of microstates.
committor_sensitivity(T, A, B, index[, forward]) Compute the committor between sets of microstates.
correlation(P, obs1[, obs2, tau, times, pi]) Compute time-correlation of obs1, or time-cross-correlation with obs2.
eigenvalue_sensitivity(T, k) computes the sensitivity of the specified eigenvalue
eigenvalues(T[, k]) computes the eigenvalues
eigenvector_sensitivity(T, k, j[, right]) Compute eigenvector sensitivity of T :Parameters: k : int Eigenvector index j : int Element index right : bool If True compute right eigenvectors, otherwise compute left eigenvectors.
eigenvectors(T[, k, right]) Compute eigenvectors of given transition matrix.
evaluate_fingerprint(timescales, amplitudes) Compute time-correlation of obs1, or time-cross-correlation with obs2.
expected_counts(p0, T, n) Compute expected transition counts for Markov chain with n steps.
fingerprint_correlation(P, obs1[, obs2, tau]) Compute dynamical fingerprint crosscorrelation.
fingerprint_relaxation(P, p0, obs[, tau]) Compute dynamical fingerprint crosscorrelation.
is_ergodic(T[, tol]) True if T is connected (irreducible) and aperiodic.
is_rate_matrix(K[, tol]) True if K is a rate matrix
is_reversible(T[, mu, tol]) True if T is a transition matrix
is_tmatrix(T[, tol]) True if T is a transition matrix
is_transition_matrix(T[, tol]) True if T is a transition matrix
mfpt(T, target) Compute vector of mean first passage times to target state.
mfpt_sensitivity(T, target, i) Compute sensitivity of mfpt :Parameters: T : ndarray, shape=(n,n) Transition matrix target : Integer or List of integers Target state or set for mfpt calculation.
pcca(T, n) returns an ndarray(m,n) with n membership functions of length m in columns to be in
rdl_decomposition(T[, k, norm]) Compute the decomposition into left and right eigenvectors.
relaxation(P, p0, obs[, tau, times, pi]) Compute time-correlation of obs1, or time-cross-correlation with obs2.
statdist(T) Compute stationary distribution of stochastic matrix T.
statdist_sensitivity(T, j) compute the sensitivity matrix of the stationary distribution of T
stationary_distribution(T) Compute stationary distribution of stochastic matrix T.
stationary_distribution_sensitivity(T, j) compute the sensitivity matrix of the stationary distribution of T
timescales(T[, tau, k]) Compute implied time scales of given transition matrix :Parameters: T : transition matrix tau : lag time k : int (optional) Compute the first k implied time scales.
tpt(T, A, B) returns a transition path TPTFlux object.
